Hello there We have read the guestion We try to help

The existing account that you use today has a password for this. If you use a different ID and password because you create this so that this forms an account for a new connection, this all happens on the same Thunderbird server of Thunderbird Imap related or pop that is Okay. so try to create a new account that is your email address and the password for a new connection. Each new ID is associated with a new or different account. The server will remain in use the same for this.


Greetings Firefox volunteer

content:
How did you install TB? If the icon isn't dragged to the Applications folder, the account setup details aren't retained between restarts.

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/installing-thunderbird-on-mac
creator: sfhowes

content: Premi il tasto Alt sulla testiera per attivare i menu classici Vai nel menu Visualizza > Messaggi Se trovi spuntata la voce Non letti, cambia l'impostazione selezionando Tutti
creator: @next
